interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Review Date: 2019/09/02 Average Rating: 4.5 Product Details: {'Audio languages': ['中文'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Li Dachao'], 'Starring': ['Wu Jinyan', 'Nie Yuan', 'Mao Zijun']} Review Text: Very well done. Love the historical dramas from the dynasties. So interesting, beautiful, mesmerizing, and addictive.

This had the best transcripts of all I have seen. BUT they did not transcribe the last summary page. Please fix that. It probably ties it all together and says what happened. Review Title: Best Subtitles and transcripts.....except final screen summary. Please translate. Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
America: Imagine a World without Her John Sullivan (Director) Rated: NR Format: DVD Movies & TV, Studio Specials, Lionsgate Home Entertainment, All Lionsgate Titles ["The new film from the creators of 2016: OBAMA'S AMERICA takes America's critics at face value and imagines a world in which she never existed. Today that notion of the essential goodness of America is under attack, replaced by another story in which theft and plunder are seen as the defining features of American history--from the theft of Native American and Mexican lands and the exploitation of African labor to a contemporary foreign policy said to be based on stealing oil and a capitalist system that robs people of their 'fair share.' Gerald Molen, the Academy Award-winning producer of SCHINDLER'S LIST, Dinesh D'Souza, the New York Times best-selling author and creator of 2016, and director John Sullivan invite you on a journey of discovery that will bring you face-to-face with America's most compelling contemporary critics along with the heroes who built America, in the times in which they lived, bled, and sacrificed in order to build a great nation. You'll be there as Christopher C"] {'Aspect Ratio': '1.85:1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'NR (Not Rated)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 7.5 x 5.4 inches; 2.72 Ounces', 'Audio Description': 'English', 'Item model number': '082401', 'Director': 'John Sullivan', 'Media Format': 'NTSC, Subtitled', 'Run time': '1 hour and 45 minutes', 'Release date': 'October 28, 2014', 'Producers': 'Gerald Molen', 'Studio': 'Lionsgate', 'Number of discs': '1'} Important video and TRUTH for our time. Makes ya proud. Five Stars The Last Airbender Noah Ringer (Actor), Nicola Peltz (Actor), M. Night Shyamalan (Director) & 0 more Rated: PG Format: Blu-ray Movies & TV, Blu-ray, Movies ['Experience the thrilling live-action adventure based on the hit Nickelodeon series', 'Avatar: The Last Airbender', '. Join Aang, an extraordinary boy with incredible “bending” powers, as he journeys through an exotic land filled with magical creatures and powerful friends. As the Avatar, he is the only one who can end the age-old conflict between the four nations: Air, Water, Earth and Fire. An inspirational journey,', 'The Last Airbender', 'is exciting entertainment for the entire family!'] {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'PG (Parental Guidance Suggested)', 'Product Dimensions': '7.5 x 0.7 x 5.4 inches; 6.4 Ounces', 'Director': 'M. Night Shyamalan', 'Media Format': 'Blu-ray', 'Run time': '1 hour and 43 minutes', 'Release date': 'November 16, 2010', 'Actors': 'Noah Ringer, Nicola Peltz, Dev Patel, Jackson Rathbone, Shaun Toub', 'Dubbed': 'French, Spanish', 'Subtitles': 'English, French, Spanish', 'Studio': 'Paramount', 'Number of discs': '2'} Addicting storyline. Great adaptation from the TV series. Hard to take an entire season and condense it into 2 hours. They hit all the high points and we are looking forward to the rest of the trilogy and hope it is produced. Amazing scenery. Great acting. That ice castle...I mean WOW. The special effects are incredible. Highly recommend. Great Movie....My family loved it. The Collected Works of Hayao Miyazaki (Amazon Exclusive) Format: Blu-ray Movies & TV, Blu-ray, Movies ['Amazon.com', 'Item Weight: 1.60 Lb.'] {'Aspect Ratio': '1.78:1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '8.86 x 7.64 x 2.24 inches; 1.34 Pounds', 'Media Format': 'Blu-ray', 'Release date': 'November 17, 2015', 'Subtitles': 'English', 'Studio': 'Walt Disney Studios', 'Number of discs': '12'} An awesome collection. My children have most of these in a hodge podge of places. This set has them all in one place and a few selection we did not have. Beautiful. Nice addition to our Studio Ghibli collection.. WOW! Cowboy Bebop: The Movie [Special Edition] Steve Blum (Actor), Beau Billingslea (Actor), Shinichiro Watanabe (Director) & 0 more Rated: R Format: DVD Movies & TV, Featured Categories, DVD, Anime ['Mars. Days before Halloween 2071. Villains blow up a tanker truck on Highway One, releasing a deadly virus that kills hundreds. Fearing a bigger, even more devastating biochemical attack, an astronomical reward is offered for the arrest and capture of the person behind the destruction. On the spaceship "Bebop," Spike Spiegel and his crew of bounty hunters (Jet Black, Faye Valentine, Ed and Ein) are bored and short of cash. But with the news of the reward everything changes. Based on the wildly popular TV series, Cowboy Bebop, the big-screen smash COWBOY BEBOP: THE MOVIE pits Spike and Co. against their deadliest adversary ever. Featuring stunning, state-of-the-art animation, this action-packed sci-fi adventure builds to a breath-taking, nail-biting climax, guaranteed to keep you hanging on the edge of your seat.'] {'Genre': 'Anime & Manga', 'Format': 'Dolby, Special Edition, NTSC, Widescreen', 'Contributor': 'Beau Billingslea, Shinichiro Watanabe, Steve Blum', 'Language': 'Unqualified', 'Runtime': '1 hour and 56 minutes', 'Aspect Ratio': '1.85:1', 'MPAA rating': 'R (Restricted)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 7.5 x 5.4 inches; 2.72 Ounces', 'Item model number': '6857', 'Director': 'Shinichiro Watanabe', 'Media Format': 'Dolby, Special Edition, NTSC, Widescreen', 'Run time': '1 hour and 56 minutes', 'Release date': 'December 7, 2010', 'Actors': 'Steve Blum, Beau Billingslea', 'Subtitles': 'English', 'Studio': 'Image Entertainment', 'Number of discs': '1'} If you are into the BeBop series...this is a great movie. I had not watched the series, but my teens liked it. I watched the movie and enjoyed it without having the background. Nice story line. this is a great movie. I had not watched the series {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'alcohol use', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['中文'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Zhao Xiaoding', 'Anthony LaMolinara'], 'Producers': ['Chen Gao', 'Sa Zhilei'], 'Starring': ['Liu Yifei', 'Yang Yang', 'Chun Li'], 'Studio': ['Well Go USA Entertainment']} I enjoy the Chinese stories. I had watched the SERIAL VERSION FIRST (Enduring Love all 63 chapters...three times.) and wanted more. YANG YANG is a favorite actor. Check out "Love 020" on NETFLIX TOO. Really addicting. iT CANNOT compare to the extended version..but shared with my daughter...she is now watching the extended version. I LIKED IT. {'Subtitles': ['None available'], 'Directors': ['Hajime Kamegaki']} What a thrill to have more Miaka and Taka!!! Amazing addition to the original. Didn't see it when broadcast, but happy to find these additional chapters. Watch it after watching Season 1 Original....you won't be sorry! OK, gotta search for chapter 10....oh oh AWESOME!!! {'Audio languages': ['中文'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Zhang Xiaozheng'], 'Starring': ['Chen Qiaoen', 'Chen Xiao']} The index is missing chapters...I let it play the last chapter and up popped NEXT episode. I clicked on it before it went back to INDEX and more chapters will play. I am on Chapter 44 and still going. Not sure how many there are. After Episode 34....let it play Song of Phoenix ['Qu Yuan, a Chinese poet and minister who is born into a good family during the Warring States Era, falls in love with a slave, Mo Chou Nu. However, their relationship is extremely prohibited due to their different status and identity. To get together, they not only face numerous obstacles but also get entangled in palace politics. And Qu Yuan is planning to save his county due to his patriotism.'] {'Audio languages': ['中文（简体）'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Chang Hsiao-Cheng'], 'Starring': ['Ma Ke', 'Viann Zhang', 'Qiao Zhenyu']} REALLY WANT TO SEE THIS SERIES. AMAZON NEEDS A VIDEO HELP SECTION PLEASE. INDEXING ISSUE...CAN ONLY ACCESS 4 EPISODES {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'foul language'], 'Audio languages': ['中文'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Yang Xiaoming'], 'Starring': ['Wang Likun', 'Luo Jin', 'Deng Lun']} What a great epic. So encompassing and interesting. I am so involved with this culture and the history, legends and life are so wonderfully depicted. Great job. thanks Amazon for putting out these great works. Ten more chapters!!! YAY!!! Hopefully the next 15 are on the way. {'Audio languages': ['中文'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Li Dachao'], 'Starring': ['Wu Jinyan', 'Nie Yuan', 'Mao Zijun']} Very well done. Love the historical dramas from the dynasties. So interesting, beautiful, mesmerizing, and addictive.

This had the best transcripts of all I have seen. BUT they did not transcribe the last summary page. Please fix that. It probably ties it all together and says what happened. Best Subtitles and transcripts.....except final screen summary. Please translate.
profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Content Consumption Preferences:** The user continues to be passionate about thought-provoking documentaries and films that challenge mainstream narratives, particularly related to American history and identity. Their enjoyment of family-friendly adventure films and curated animated collections remains strong, complemented by a growing interest in compelling international stories from China. They appreciate anime with rich storytelling and character development.

- **Values:** The user cherishes patriotic themes that highlight American virtues while embracing universally appealing animated films with moral and imaginative depth. Their expanding interest in international storytelling reflects a desire for culturally resonant experiences, particularly in historical dramas.

- **Review Behavior:** Typically providing high ratings, the user recently rated a historical drama highly, emphasizing its captivating aspects while also noting an issue with the final screen summary's transcription. This indicates a continued focus on seamless viewing experiences and high-quality presentation.

- **Engagement Style:** Their reviews are detailed and enthusiastic, highlighting storytelling, visuals, and overall presentation. They provide a balanced perspective with positive feedback while also offering constructive criticism, particularly regarding content accessibility.

- **Interest in Historical Contexts:** The user maintains a strong passion for historical themes that aim to redefine American history, intertwining their love for adventure and family values with an appreciation for immersive international narratives.

Overall, the user is dedicated to content aligning with their patriotic viewpoints, focusing on positive narratives and thoughtful engagement in both American and international storytelling.
